Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;wort and yeast water^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;麦芽汁和酵母水^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: First, make one measure of ^orange;Yeast Water^white;. I already taught you how to do this. Next, use the ^orange;Mashing Tun^white; to mix your malt with water. We need one flask of ^orange;Wort^white;.
Texts.Chs: 首先，制作一份^orange;酵母水^white;，我以前已经教过你制作方法了。接下来，使用^orange;糖化桶^white;把水和麦芽混合起来。我们需要一瓶^orange;麦芽汁^white;。

Texts.Eng: Now we have everything we need to make beer, the glory of the Gods.
Texts.Chs: 现在我们把酿造啤酒所需的一切都完成了！
